wikipedia_page.main: Evelyn Kathleen Welch  (née Samuels; born 1959) is an American-English scholar of the Renaissance and Early Modern Period, and professor of Renaissance Studies, Provost, and Senior Vice President (Arts & Sciences) at King’s College London. She served as the Interim President and Principal of King's College London from February to June 2021.

response: Stockwell was born in Galveston, Texas, the son of Ellen Richards and John S. Samuels III, an attorney. Stockwell's sister is historian Evelyn Welch, and his niece is singer and songwriter Florence Welch. He attended Harvard University, and simultaneously began commuting to New York City to appear on episodes of the soap opera Guiding Light.
